chess

Class ChessPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.ChessPiece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class ChessPiece
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class which contains all the methods necessary for creating the other chess pieces.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChessPiece

        public ChessPiece(java.lang.String color,
                  Chessboard board,
                  int row,
                  int column)
        The constructor used for each ChessPiece.
        Parameters:
        color - Description: String of Color to be assigned to the generated ChessPiece.
        board - Description: Chessboard object of the Board for the created ChessPiece to be placed on.
        row - Description: Numerical value of the row for the piece to be placed.
        column - Description: Numerical value of the column for the piece to be placed.

      • move

        public void move(java.lang.String command)
        Generic move method that takes the implicit Chess Piece and moves it to the given location It checks to make sure it is valid to move to that place
        Parameters:
        command - Description: String form of a location to send the Chess Piece
